description.text:
Role: Machine Learning Engineer
 Seniority Level: Senior
 Location: Stockholm, Sweden (100% Onsite)
 Remote: Not allowed (0%)
 Application Deadline: 27 June 2025
Assignment Overview
We are looking for a skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our client's AI/ML team. You will play a key role in designing and developing scalable ML systems and infrastructure, contributing to both research and production-ready ML products in a complex and data-rich environment.
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, test, and deploy AI/ML software products.
Explore large datasets, perform feature engineering, and evaluate model outputs.
Scale ML solutions to meet the needs of a large, distributed business network.
Build and maintain large-scale data infrastructure for AI/ML projects.
Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code using software engineering best practices.
Develop shared ML components and frameworks (e.g., for feature reuse, A/B testing, traceability).
Collaborate within cross-functional agile teams, including engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders.

Required Qualifications & Experience
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).
Minimum 4 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or in a similar role.
Strong programming skills with at least 3 years of experience in Python.
Proven experience building software products successfully deployed in production environments.
Solid understanding of MLOps and experience in developing and deploying ML pipelines.
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (preferably Google Cloud, especially Vertex AI).
Working knowledge of modern AI/ML techniques and frameworks.
Experience with high-volume data handling, including batch and stream processing.
Strong grasp of data structures, data storage technologies, and databases.
Comfortable working in agile teams with a focus on collaboration, experimentation, and data-driven development.



Certification Requirement
Cloud certification in GCP, AWS, or Azure is required.
Consultants not already certified must obtain a certificate within 1 month of the assignment start date.



Required Skills
Python
Machine Learning (ML)
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Vertex AI
AWS or Azure (optional but certification required)
MLOps & ML pipelines
Data engineering & infrastructure
description.text_formatted:
Role: Machine Learning Engineer

Seniority Level: Senior

Location: Stockholm, Sweden (100% Onsite)

Remote: Not allowed (0%)

Application Deadline: 27 June 2025

Assignment Overview

We are looking for a skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our client's AI/ML team. You will play a key role in designing and developing scalable ML systems and infrastructure, contributing to both research and production-ready ML products in a complex and data-rich environment.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, test, and deploy AI/ML software products.
  • Explore large datasets, perform feature engineering, and evaluate model outputs.
  • Scale ML solutions to meet the needs of a large, distributed business network.
  • Build and maintain large-scale data infrastructure for AI/ML projects.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code using software engineering best practices.
  • Develop shared ML components and frameworks (e.g., for feature reuse, A/B testing, traceability).
  • Collaborate within cross-functional agile teams, including engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders.

Required Qualifications & Experience

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • Minimum 4 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or in a similar role.
  • Strong programming skills with at least 3 years of experience in Python.
  • Proven experience building software products successfully deployed in production environments.
  • Solid understanding of MLOps and experience in developing and deploying ML pipelines.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (preferably Google Cloud, especially Vertex AI).
  • Working knowledge of modern AI/ML techniques and frameworks.
  • Experience with high-volume data handling, including batch and stream processing.
  • Strong grasp of data structures, data storage technologies, and databases.
  • Comfortable working in agile teams with a focus on collaboration, experimentation, and data-driven development.


Certification Requirement

  • Cloud certification in GCP, AWS, or Azure is required.
  • Consultants not already certified must obtain a certificate within 1 month of the assignment start date.


Required Skills

  • Python
  • Machine Learning (ML)
  • Artificial Intelligence (AI)
  • Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • Vertex AI
  • AWS or Azure (optional but certification required)
  • MLOps & ML pipelines
  • Data engineering & infrastructure
